title: The After Show Discusses What We’d Smoke if the World was Ending
itunes:title: The After Show Discusses What We’d Smoke if the World was Ending
description:
This week, The After Show discusses what cigars we would smoke if we knew the world was coming to an end. Do we choose any of the same ones?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
